dc:title: Fall Appeal - 1972
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: While appealing for help, she extols the constant stream of young volunteers who come to the CW, "as to a school," preparing them for careers in line with the works of mercy. Notes their folly and reliance on the "little way" of St. Therese.
